verbs.description: Upon [V: arriving] [ARG4: to Washington] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] , President Trump held French President Marcon 's hand for way too long , again . This is not the first time .

[ARGM-TMP: Upon arriving to Washington on Monday] , [ARG0: President Trump] [V: held] [ARG1: French President Marcon 's hand] [ARGM-TMP: for way too long] , [ARGM-ADV: again] . This is not the first time .
Upon arriving to Washington on Monday , President Trump held French President Marcon 's hand for way too long , again . [ARG1: This] [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: not] [ARG2: the first time] .
